name: Daub Cash
description:
Now, you can play the Bingo style game and win real prizes! Bring Daub Cash wherever you go on your iPhone and iPad!

On Daub Cash, Bingo is not a game of chance, instead, Daub Cash is a skill based Bingo. You don’t need to worry about your opponent having a better set of cards. You and your opponent will see the same sequence of cards and balls. You are in FULL control of your winning! Bingo masters, come and play Daub Cash and win real prizes!

Key Features:
- Daub quickly and use boosts to help get bingos, no need to count on luck
- Join the multiplayer cash tournaments to win BIG prizes
- Participate in league competitions for even larger prizes
- Play for free to collect daily rewards and bonus cash
- No ads
- Challenge your friends or other players in the live social feed
- Lots of rewards for loyal players
- Simple to use and easy to navigate with world-class graphics design
- Compete against opponents with similar skills

If you have any questions, please contact support@celer.network

Powered by CelerX.
